sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT MAX(T.CONSOL_NO) AS CONSOL_NO ,COUNT(DISTINCT T.CONSOL_NO) AS ROW_CNT
,'SB' AS SB_YN FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP T WHERE T.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# GROUP BY T.SO_NO

/*searchLPShipmentList*/ SELECT '' CHK ,P.WOB_BK_NO AS TREE_VALUE ,P.WOB_BK_NO AS TREE_NAME ,'1' AS tree_nodetype ,'' AS IMAGE ,'' AS ITEM_CD ,'' AS ITEM_NM ,'' AS SO_NO ,'' AS PO_SYS_NO ,'' AS PO_NO ,'' AS ITEM_SYS_NO ,'' AS SHIPNO ,0 AS SHIPNO_SEQ ,'' AS SHIP_NO_SEQ ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY) AS ITEM_QTY ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_CBM) AS ITEM_CBM ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS) AS ITEM_GRS_KGS ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS) AS ITEM_NET_KGS ,'' AS SAO_NO ,'' AS MERGE_YN ,MAX(P.CONSOL_NO) AS CONSOL_NO ,'' AS ITEM_LOT ,'' AS LOT_ID ,'' AS SAO_SYS_NO FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP P WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND P.LP_ID IS NULL AND P.LP_STATUS = 'G' GROUP BY P.CONSOL_NO ,P.WOB_BK_NO UNION SELECT '' CHK ,ISNULL(P.WOB_BK_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.ITEM_SYS_NO,'') AS TREE_VALUE ,ISNULL(P.ITEM_CD,'') AS TREE_NAME ,'2' AS tree_nodetype ,'' AS IMAGE ,'' AS ITEM_CD ,'' AS ITEM_NM ,'' AS SO_NO ,'' AS PO_SYS_NO ,'' AS PO_NO ,'' AS ITEM_SYS_NO ,'' AS SHIPNO ,0 AS SHIPNO_SEQ ,'' AS SHIP_NO_SEQ ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY) AS ITEM_QTY ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_CBM) AS ITEM_CBM ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS) AS ITEM_GRS_KGS ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS) AS ITEM_NET_KGS ,'' AS SAO_NO ,'' AS MERGE_YN ,MAX(P.CONSOL_NO) AS CONSOL_NO ,'' AS ITEM_LOT ,'' AS LOT_ID ,'' AS SAO_SYS_NO FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP P WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND P.LP_ID IS NULL AND P.LP_STATUS = 'G' GROUP BY P.CONSOL_NO ,P.WOB_BK_NO ,P.ITEM_SYS_NO ,P.ITEM_CD UNION SELECT '' CHK ,ISNULL(P.WOB_BK_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.ITEM_SYS_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.LOT_ID,'') + '(' + ISNULL(P.WH_LOC_CD,'') + ')' AS TREE_VALUE ,ISNULL(P.LOT_ID,'') + '(' + ISNULL(P.WH_LOC_CD,'') + ')' AS TREE_NAME ,'3' AS tree_nodetype ,'' AS IMAGE ,'' AS ITEM_CD ,'' AS ITEM_NM ,'' AS SO_NO ,'' AS PO_SYS_NO ,'' AS PO_NO ,'' AS ITEM_SYS_NO ,'' AS SHIPNO ,0 AS SHIPNO_SEQ ,'' AS SHIP_NO_SEQ ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY) AS ITEM_QTY ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_CBM) AS ITEM_CBM ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS) AS ITEM_GRS_KGS ,SUM(P.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS) AS ITEM_NET_KGS ,'' AS SAO_NO ,'' AS MERGE_YN ,MAX(P.CONSOL_NO) AS CONSOL_NO ,'' AS ITEM_LOT ,'' AS LOT_ID ,'' AS SAO_SYS_NO FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP P WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND P.LP_ID IS NULL AND P.LP_STATUS = 'G' GROUP BY P.CONSOL_NO ,P.WOB_BK_NO ,P.ITEM_SYS_NO ,P.LOT_ID ,P.WH_LOC_CD UNION SELECT '' CHK, INVAL.TREE_VALUE, INVAL.TREE_NAME ,'4' AS tree_nodetype ,'' AS IMAGE ,'' AS ITEM_CD ,'' AS ITEM_NM ,'' AS SO_NO ,'' AS PO_SYS_NO ,'' AS PO_NO ,'' AS ITEM_SYS_NO ,'' AS SHIPNO ,0 AS SHIPNO_SEQ ,'' AS SHIP_NO_SEQ , SUM(INVAL.ITEM_QTY) AS ITEM_QTY , SUM(INVAL.ITEM_CBM) AS ITEM_CBM , SUM(INVAL.ITEM_GRS_KGS) AS ITEM_GRS_KGS , SUM(INVAL.ITEM_NET_KGS) AS ITEM_NET_KGS ,'' AS SAO_NO , CASE WHEN MAX(INVAL.MERGE_YN) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MERGE_YN , MAX(INVAL.CONSOL_NO) AS CONSOL_NO ,'' AS ITEM_LOT ,'' AS LOT_ID ,'' AS SAO_SYS_NO FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(P.WOB_BK_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.ITEM_SYS_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.LOT_ID,'') + '(' + ISNULL(P.WH_LOC_CD,'') + ')' + ISNULL(P.WIB_BK_NO,'') AS TREE_VALUE , ISNULL(P.WIB_BK_NO, '') AS TREE_NAME , P.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY AS ITEM_QTY , P.LP_ITEM_CBM AS ITEM_CBM , P.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS AS ITEM_GRS_KGS , P.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS AS ITEM_NET_KGS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP T WHERE T.CONSOL_NO = P.CONSOL_NO AND T.SHIPNO = P.SHIPNO AND T.LP_STATUS = 'G' AND T.SHIPNO_SEQ = 0) MERGE_YN , P.CONSOL_NO AS CONSOL_NO FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP P WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND P.LP_ID IS NULL AND P.LP_STATUS = 'G') INVAL GROUP BY INVAL.TREE_VALUE, INVAL.TREE_NAME UNION SELECT '' CHK ,ISNULL(P.WOB_BK_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.ITEM_SYS_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.LOT_ID,'') + '(' + ISNULL(P.WH_LOC_CD,'') + ')' + ISNULL(P.WIB_BK_NO,'') + ISNULL(P.SHIPNO,'') AS TREE_VALUE ,ISNULL(P.SHIPNO,'') AS TREE_NAME ,'5' AS tree_nodetype ,'' AS IMAGE ,P.ITEM_CD ,P.ITEM_NM ,P.SO_NO ,P.PO_SYS_NO ,P.PO_NO ,P.ITEM_SYS_NO ,P.SHIPNO ,P.SHIPNO_SEQ ,'' AS SHIP_NO_SEQ ,P.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY AS ITEM_QTY ,P.LP_ITEM_CBM AS ITEM_CBM ,P.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS AS ITEM_GRS_KGS ,P.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS AS ITEM_NET_KGS ,P.SAO_NO AS SAO_NO ,CASE(SELECT COUNT(*) AS PC_CNT FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP T WHERE T.CONSOL_NO = P.CONSOL_NO AND T.WOB_BK_NO = P.WOB_BK_NO AND T.ITEM_CD = P.ITEM_CD AND T.LOT_ID = P.LOT_ID AND T.WH_LOC_CD = P.WH_LOC_CD AND T.WIB_BK_NO = P.WIB_BK_NO) WHEN 1 THEN '999' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),(SELECT COUNT(*) AS PC_CNT FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP T WHERE T.CONSOL_NO = P.CONSOL_NO AND T.WOB_BK_NO = P.WOB_BK_NO AND T.ITEM_CD = P.ITEM_CD AND T.LOT_ID = P.LOT_ID AND T.WH_LOC_CD = P.WH_LOC_CD AND T.WIB_BK_NO = P.WIB_BK_NO AND T.LP_ID IS NOT NULL)) END AS MERGE_YN ,P.CONSOL_NO ,(SELECT MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_02) FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L ,TL_WH_OB O WHERE L.CTRT_NO = O.CTRT_NO AND L.ITEM_SYS_NO = P.ITEM_SYS_NO AND L.LOT_ID = P.LOT_ID AND O.WOB_BK_NO = P.WOB_BK_NO ) AS ITEM_LOT ,P.LOT_ID ,P.SAO_SYS_NO FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP P WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND P.LP_ID IS NULL AND P.LP_STATUS = 'G' ORDER by tree_value, tree_nodetype

/*searchLPCNTRParentList*/ SELECT '' CHK ,R.TREE_VALUE ,R.TREE_NAME ,R.TREE_NODETYPE ,R.ID ,R.SEQ ,R.ID_SEQ ,R.ITEM_CD ,R.ITEM_NM ,R.ITEM_LOT ,R.CUST_ORD_NO ,R.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY ,R.LP_ITEM_CBM ,R.LP_ITEM_CBF ,R.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS ,R.LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS ,R.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS ,R.LP_ITEM_NET_LBS ,R.LOT_ID ,R.SHIPNO ,R.SHIPNO_SEQ ,R.SO_NO ,R.WOB_BK_NO ,R.WIB_BK_NO ,R.SAO_SYS_NO ,R.PO_SYS_NO ,R.ITEM_SYS_NO ,R.WH_LOC_CD ,R.ITEM_SEQ ,R.SAO_NO ,R.PO_NO ,R.LP_STATUS ,R.LP_SHIP_LTNO ,R.LP_SHIP_SEQ_LTNO ,R.LP_OLD_ID ,R.LP_OLD_SEQ ,R.LP_ID ,R.LP_SEQ ,R.EQ_TP_CD FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(G.LP_ID,'') + '-' + ISNULL(dbo.LPAD(G.LP_SEQ,2,0),0)+'1' AS TREE_VALUE ,'' AS TREE_NAME ,'1' AS TREE_NODETYPE ,ISNULL(G.LP_ID,'') + '-' + ISNULL(dbo.LPAD(G.LP_SEQ,2,0),0) AS WOB_BK_NO ,G.LP_ID AS ID ,G.LP_SEQ AS SEQ ,ISNULL(G.LP_ID,'') + '-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),ISNULL(G.LP_SEQ,0)) AS ID_SEQ ,MAX(P.EQ_NO) AS ITEM_CD ,MAX(P.LP_NO) AS ITEM_NM ,MAX(CASE WHEN P.LP_STS_CD = 'P' THEN 'Load Plan' WHEN P.LP_STS_CD = 'L' THEN 'Complete' ELSE NULL END) AS ITEM_LOT ,'' AS CUST_ORD_NO
,CONVERT(VARCHAR(22),CONVERT(NUMERIC(18),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY))) AS LP_ITEM_EA_QTY ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_CBM))) AS LP_ITEM_CBM ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_CBF))) AS LP_ITEM_CBF ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS))) AS LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS))) AS LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS))) AS LP_ITEM_NET_KGS ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_NET_LBS))) AS LP_ITEM_NET_LBS ,'' AS LOT_ID
,'' AS SHIPNO ,0 AS SHIPNO_SEQ ,MAX(S.SO_NO) AS SO_NO
,MAX(S.WIB_BK_NO) AS WIB_BK_NO ,MAX(S.SAO_SYS_NO) AS SAO_SYS_NO ,MAX(S.PO_SYS_NO) AS PO_SYS_NO ,MAX(S.ITEM_SYS_NO) AS ITEM_SYS_NO ,MAX(S.WH_LOC_CD) AS WH_LOC_CD ,MAX(S.ITEM_SEQ) AS ITEM_SEQ ,MAX(S.SAO_NO) AS SAO_NO ,MAX(S.PO_NO) AS PO_NO ,MAX(S.LP_STATUS) AS LP_STATUS ,MAX(S.LP_SHIP_LTNO) AS LP_SHIP_LTNO ,MAX(S.LP_SHIP_SEQ_LTNO) AS LP_SHIP_SEQ_LTNO ,MAX(S.LP_OLD_ID) AS LP_OLD_ID ,MAX(S.LP_OLD_SEQ) AS LP_OLD_SEQ ,MAX(G.LP_ID) AS LP_ID ,MAX(G.LP_SEQ) AS LP_SEQ ,MAX(G.EQ_TP_CD) AS EQ_TP_CD FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_GRP G LEFT JOIN TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP S ON G.CONSOL_NO = S.CONSOL_NO AND G.LP_ID = S.LP_ID AND G.LP_SEQ = S.LP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN P ON G.CONSOL_NO = P.CONSOL_NO AND G.LP_ID = P.LP_ID AND G.LP_SEQ = P.LP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TL_WH_OB B ON S.WOB_BK_NO = B.WOB_BK_NO WHERE G.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# GROUP BY G.LP_ID, G.LP_SEQ
UNION All
SELECT ISNULL(G.LP_ID,'') + '-' + ISNULL(dbo.LPAD(G.LP_SEQ,2,0),0)+'2' AS TREE_VALUE ,'' AS TREE_NAME ,'2' AS TREE_NODETYPE ,'Booking No' AS WOB_BK_NO ,G.LP_ID AS ID ,G.LP_SEQ AS SEQ ,G.LP_ID+'-'+CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),ISNULL(G.LP_SEQ,0)) AS ID_SEQ ,'Item' AS ITEM_CD ,'Item Name' AS ITEM_NM ,'Item Lot' AS ITEM_LOT ,'Cust Order No' AS CUST_ORD_NO ,'EA Qty' AS LP_ITEM_EA_QTY ,'CBM' AS LP_ITEM_CBM ,'CBF' AS LP_ITEM_CBF ,'GWT' AS LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS ,'GLB' AS LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS ,'NWT' AS LP_ITEM_NET_KGS ,'NLB' AS LP_ITEM_NET_LBS ,'Lot ID' ,'' AS SHIPNO ,0 AS SHIPNO_SEQ ,MAX(S.SO_NO) ,MAX(S.WIB_BK_NO) ,MAX(S.SAO_SYS_NO) ,MAX(S.PO_SYS_NO) ,MAX(S.ITEM_SYS_NO) ,MAX(S.WH_LOC_CD) ,MAX(S.ITEM_SEQ) ,MAX(S.SAO_NO) ,MAX(S.PO_NO) ,MAX(S.LP_STATUS) ,MAX(S.LP_SHIP_LTNO) ,MAX(S.LP_SHIP_SEQ_LTNO) ,MAX(S.LP_OLD_ID) ,MAX(S.LP_OLD_SEQ) ,MAX(G.LP_ID) ,MAX(G.LP_SEQ) ,MAX(G.EQ_TP_CD) FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_GRP G LEFT JOIN TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP S ON G.CONSOL_NO = S.CONSOL_NO AND G.LP_ID = S.LP_ID AND G.LP_SEQ = S.LP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN P ON G.CONSOL_NO = P.CONSOL_NO AND G.LP_ID = P.LP_ID AND G.LP_SEQ = P.LP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TL_WH_OB B ON S.WOB_BK_NO = B.WOB_BK_NO WHERE G.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# GROUP BY G.LP_ID ,G.LP_SEQ ,G.CONSOL_NO
UNION ALL
SELECT ISNULL(S.LP_ID,'') + '-' + ISNULL(dbo.LPAD(S.LP_SEQ,2,0),0)+'3' AS TREE_VALUE ,'' AS TREE_NAME ,'2' AS TREE_NODETYPE ,S.WOB_BK_NO ,S.LP_ID AS ID ,S.LP_SEQ AS SEQ ,S.LP_ID+'-'+CONVERT(VARCHAR(11),ISNULL(S.LP_SEQ,0)) AS ID_SEQ ,S.ITEM_CD ,S.ITEM_NM ,(SELECT MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_02) FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L ,TL_WH_OB O WHERE L.CTRT_NO = O.CTRT_NO AND L.ITEM_SYS_NO = S.ITEM_SYS_NO AND L.LOT_ID = S.LOT_ID AND O.WOB_BK_NO = S.WOB_BK_NO ) AS ITEM_LOT ,'' AS CUST_ORD_NO ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(22),CONVERT(NUMERIC(18),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_EA_QTY))) AS LP_ITEM_EA_QTY ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_CBM))) AS LP_ITEM_CBM ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_CBF))) AS LP_ITEM_CBF ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS))) AS LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS))) AS LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_NET_KGS))) AS LP_ITEM_NET_KGS ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(21),CONVERT(DECIMAL(15,3),SUM(S.LP_ITEM_NET_LBS))) AS LP_ITEM_NET_LBS ,S.LOT_ID
,S.SHIPNO ,S.SHIPNO_SEQ ,S.SO_NO
,S.WIB_BK_NO ,S.SAO_SYS_NO ,S.PO_SYS_NO ,S.ITEM_SYS_NO ,S.WH_LOC_CD ,S.ITEM_SEQ ,S.SAO_NO ,S.PO_NO ,S.LP_STATUS ,S.LP_SHIP_LTNO ,S.LP_SHIP_SEQ_LTNO ,S.LP_OLD_ID ,S.LP_OLD_SEQ ,S.LP_ID ,S.LP_SEQ ,'' AS EQ_TP_CD FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP S LEFT JOIN TL_WH_LOAD_PLAN P ON S.CONSOL_NO = P.CONSOL_NO AND S.LP_ID = P.LP_ID AND S.LP_SEQ = P.LP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TL_WH_OB B ON S.WOB_BK_NO = B.WOB_BK_NO WHERE S.CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND S.LP_ID IS NOT NULL AND S.LP_STATUS = 'G' GROUP BY S.LP_ID, S.LP_SEQ, S.WOB_BK_NO, S.ITEM_CD, S.ITEM_NM , S.ITEM_SYS_NO, S.LOT_ID, S.SHIPNO, S.SHIPNO_SEQ, S.SO_NO , S.WIB_BK_NO, S.SAO_SYS_NO, S.PO_SYS_NO, S.WH_LOC_CD, S.ITEM_SEQ , S.SAO_NO, S.PO_NO, S.LP_STATUS, S.LP_SHIP_LTNO, S.LP_SHIP_SEQ_LTNO ,S.LP_OLD_ID, S.LP_OLD_SEQ ) R ORDER BY TREE_VALUE

/*searchLPVolume*/ SELECT CONSOL_NO AS F_CONSOL_NO ,CAST(SUM(LP_ITEM_EA_QTY) as INTEGER) AS TTL_ITEM_EA_QTY ,CAST(SUM(LP_ITEM_CBM) AS DECIMAL(15,3)) AS TTL_ITEM_CBM ,CAST(SUM(LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS)AS DECIMAL(15,3)) AS TTL_ITEM_GRS_KGS ,CAST(SUM(LP_ITEM_NET_KGS)AS DECIMAL(15,3)) AS TTL_ITEM_NET_KGS FROM TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP WHERE CONSOL_NO = #consol_no# AND LP_STATUS = 'G' GROUP BY CONSOL_NO

/*searchShipNo*/ DECLARE @PRE_FIX VARCHAR (20) SET @PRE_FIX = ('A') SELECT 'S' + SUBSTRING (#org_cd#, 3, 3) + ISNULL(@PRE_FIX, '') + CASE ISNULL(@PRE_FIX, 'NULL') WHEN 'NULL' THEN RIGHT(CONVERT (VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112), 8) ELSE RIGHT(CONVERT (VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112), 7) END + dbo.LPAD ((SELECT SEQ + 1 FROM TB_MJR_NO_SEQ WHERE NO_TP_CD = 'SHIP'), 6, '0') AS SHIP_NO
sqlMap.insert: /*insertSeqShipNo*/ INSERT INTO TB_MJR_NO_SEQ(NO_TP_CD, SEQ, MAX_SEQ, DESCR) values ('SHIP', 0, 9999999, 'SHIP SEQ')
sqlMap.update: /*updateSeqShipNo*/ UPDATE TB_MJR_NO_SEQ SET SEQ = SEQ + 1 where NO_TP_CD = 'SHIP'
sqlMap.insert: /*addCONSOL*/ INSERT INTO TL_WH_PSUDO_LP_SHIP( CONSOL_NO, SHIPNO, SHIPNO_SEQ, SO_NO, WOB_BK_NO, WIB_BK_NO, SAO_SYS_NO, PO_SYS_NO, ITEM_SYS_NO, LOT_ID, WH_LOC_CD, ITEM_SEQ, SAO_NO, PO_NO, ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, LP_ITEM_EA_QTY, LP_ITEM_CBM, LP_ITEM_CBF, LP_ITEM_GRS_KGS, LP_ITEM_GRS_LBS, LP_ITEM_NET_KGS, LP_ITEM_NET_LBS, LP_STATUS, RGST_ID, RGST_OFC_CD, RGST_SYS_DT, RGST_LOC_DT, MODI_ID, MODI_OFC_CD, MODI_SYS_DT, MODI_LOC_DT )VALUES( #consol_no#, #shipno#, 0, #so_no#, #wob_bk_no#, #wib_bk_no#, #sao_sys_no#, #po_sys_no#, #item_sys_no#, #lot_id#, #wh_loc_cd#, #item_seq#, #sao_no#, #po_no#, #item_cd#, #item_nm#, #lp_item_ea_qty#, #lp_item_cbm#, #lp_item_cbf#, #lp_item_grs_kgs#, #lp_item_grs_lbs#, #lp_item_net_kgs#, #lp_item_net_lbs#, 'G', #user_id#, #org_cd#, GETDATE(), CONVERT(DATETIME,dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE_DT(#wh_cd#)), #user_id#, #org_cd#, GETDATE(), CONVERT(DATETIME,dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE_DT(#wh_cd#)) )
